mapper.select: select count(*) from help where help_type = #{type}

select HELP_NO, HELP_TYPE, HELP_TITLE, HELP_CONTENT, HELP_CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_NO, nickname, UPLOAD_FILE_NAME, STORE_FILE_NAME from help left join filestore on (help_no = board_no) left join member using(member_no) where board_type = 'HELP' AND FILE_LEVEL = 2 order by HELP_CREATE_DATE desc

SELECT distinct member.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, PWD, NAME, ENROLL_DATE, NICKNAME, email, PHONE, ADMIN, address FROM member LEFT JOIN address ON member.MEMBER_NO = address.MEMBER_NO WHERE is_main = 'Y' order by ENROLL_DATE desc
select count(*) from member where member_id LIKE '%' + #{memberId} + '%'

SELECT distinct member.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, PWD, NAME, ENROLL_DATE, NICKNAME, email, PHONE, ADMIN, address FROM member LEFT JOIN address ON member.MEMBER_NO = address.MEMBER_NO WHERE is_main = 'Y' and member_id LIKE '%' + #{memberId} + '%' order by ENROLL_DATE desc
select count(*) from member where nickname LIKE '%' + #{nickname} + '%'

SELECT distinct member.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, PWD, NAME, ENROLL_DATE, NICKNAME, email, PHONE, ADMIN, address FROM member LEFT JOIN address ON member.MEMBER_NO = address.MEMBER_NO WHERE is_main = 'Y' and nickname LIKE '%' + #{nickname} + '%' order by ENROLL_DATE desc
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM MEMBER WHERE ENROLL_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 29 AND ENROLL_DATE <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY ENROLL_DATE ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE
SELECT ENROLL_DATE AS enrollDate FROM MEMBER WHERE ENROLL_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 29 AND ENROLL_DATE <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY ENROLL_DATE ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE
